channel.title: Blogs on Cup of Tegan
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Cup of Tegan

item.title: Freelance: A Retrospective
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: A few weeks ago, I started got my first freelance frontend development project and I was a different person. I have had a few opportunties to do freelance work over the last few years, but each time I have buckled under anxiety and the dread of not being good enough. Due to some other things that are happening in my life, this time I chose to stare those worries in the face and accept their challenge.

item.title: DIY banana face mask
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: In general I don’t do routine. My only routine is not having a routine. So as you may expect, I don’t really have a beauty or skincare regime: I wash my face in the shower üõÄ and splash my face with soap üßº in the evenings sometimes if I feel like it. I don’t wear much makeup, especially not foundation but I am a terrible face toucher and skin picker.

item.title: Treat yourself like a Sim
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Sometimes you have low days. Days that it is hard to get out of bed, let alone leave the house. For me, these days are usually paired with pajamas and mild anxiety of what is outside my door, and the guilt of failing to be a ‘normal’ human being. It is the sort of day where I will just plunge into a computer game as it means I have to make very little in the way of real life decisions.

item.title: 2019 birthday wishlist
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Oh hey! It’s my 2Ô∏è‚É£7Ô∏è‚É£th birthday soon! üéâ Gift ideas As most of you know, I am trying to reduce my waste. This adventure has been touching so many parts of my life and I have been trying to find a maintainable balance. It also means I am questioning the social constructs that have a habit of generating waste, and at this time of year, I am focussing on birthdays, specifically.
